document_data.mainbody:
ingus Etcherly was the editor-in-chief of the Findings from the Hinterlands publication for a time during the late 15 century DR.
In the , Mingus arranged for a hastily written issue of Findings to be published to warn folks of the Sword Coast about the cult of the Absolute. He collected reports from Elturgard to complete the new edition, then dispatched messengers to surrounding cities in the Western Heartlands to glean more information.
